name: Chuusotsu! 1.5th Graduation: The Moving Castle
description:
Join Arue and her merry Chuusotsu band on her first visit to a certain doujin event in the Big Site, and share in her struggles as an aspiring manga creator!

Chuusotsu! 1.5th Graduation - The Moving Castle is a visual novel that directly follows the events of Chuusotsu! 1st Graduation: Time After Time.

Features

  • Fully voiced main characters
  • New illustrations
  • New characters
  • A cheerful side story that continues the story of the first game
